frc.robot.subsystems

Class Hood

  • java.lang.Object
    • SubsystemBase
      • frc.robot.subsystems.Hood

  • public class Hood
extends SubsystemBase
    Defines a Hood object. Code inside creates variables for the hood motor and limit switches.

      static WPI_TalonFX hoodMotor
